channel.title: How Do I change what rights people start with?
channel.description: I was wondering how I change what rights players start with. I have made a world 2 and I wanted it so that people will be owner when they login. It will basically be like a free version of my server with no rules. :D

item.title: How Do I change what rights people start with?
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

go to player.java, press ctrl + f and search for rights, change it from 0 to 3 <-- somet like that

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I change what rights people start with?
